name: Collector Service
description:
COLLECTOR SERVICE

Collector Service is a small game about collecting trash from the sea and helping the ocean! Earn money, find souvenirs and buy upgrades for your gondola.

The idea came from real life trash cleaning with a gondola. The game was made by 2 friends and some help from a musician in Gamemaker Studio. It was a summer project and took around 3 months. We promise to update the game and bring some new additions to it in the future. An android version should be coming until the end of the year!

We hope you'll have fun playing Collector Service!


If you encounter any bugs or glitches, make sure to let us know!
